column2: The Rain is continuing in [Root.GetName] and we haven't seen a blue sky for weeks. We need sufficient rain for our fields, but excessive rain will cause a bad crop in comming autumn.
We pray to some patron saints to stop the rain.
The weather in [Root.GetName] is extremely cold this year. A cool summer is welcome, however poor people are dying from the cold and the  peasants begin to worry about their crops in autumn.
Saint Eurosia and Medard, please help us!
Because of bad weather or demon's work, the crops in [Root.GetName] were terrible this year. We have to prepare for the coming food shortage.
Let's hope that we can survive this winter.

The bad crops brought a serious famine in [Root.GetName]! There is nothing to eat and the peasants are selling their family as slaves. They might be still happier than the people who havedied from hunger.
Buy foods and help the poor peasants and citizens!
Thanks to the protection of God and our patron saints, we have good crops in [Root.GetName]. We can hold a great harvest feast this year!
We have nothing to worry about this winter.
